com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.beans

Class BeanStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.beans.BeanStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBeanStorage, IDataStorage<ISharedBeanDescriptor,ISharedBean>, IReadOnlyDataStorage<ISharedBeanDescriptor,ISharedBean>

    public class BeanStorage
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBeanStorage
    Implements a non-persistent in memory storage of beans.
    Author:
    dawood

        Specified by:
        clear in interface IDataStorage<ISharedBeanDescriptor,ISharedBean>
